name: Portfolio Builder 1
description:
This game is a prototype game that I used to build my skills with Unity. It is an endless, round based PvE "shooter". There are many lessons I learned when making this game and I plan to put them to use in my next game. There are no actual settings so sorry for the loud noises and for controls I will have them listed below. All of the of the sound bits/music were gathered from open sourced websites, if anyone wants the credits for them I can go find them again. All of the assets were also free from the Unity Asset Store. I am also aware that the game has a plethora of bugs, but I will not be fixing them anytime soon. 

Controls:

Movement- AWSD & Mouse : Jump -Spacebar

Shoot/Throw (Reload)- Left Mouse Button

Change Perspective- F

Change Weapon- C

Pause- Escape Button
